description:
openSUSE Leap Micro 6.1 distribution for containerized and virtualized workloads is now available for download with new features and improvements. Here's what's new!

The post openSUSE Leap Micro 6.1 Released with Simplified and Smoother Upgrades appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: openSUSE Leap Micro 6.1 Released with Simplified and Smoother Upgrades

description:
Collabora announced this week that its open-source NVK Vulkan graphics driver in the Mesa open-source graphics stack for NVIDIA hardware is now officially conformant with …

The post NVK Open-Source Driver for NVIDIA GPUs Reaches Vulkan 1.4 Conformance appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: NVK Open-Source Driver for NVIDIA GPUs Reaches Vulkan 1.4 Conformance

description:
Fwupd 2.0.3 Linux firmware updater utility is now available for download with power quirk for Framework laptops, support for the Primax Ryder mouse, and other changes.

The post Fwupd 2.0.3 Linux Firmware Updater Adds Power Quirk for Framework Laptops appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Fwupd 2.0.3 Linux Firmware Updater Adds Power Quirk for Framework Laptops
